document.discussion_title: Watch NZ Herald Focus: Lisa Carrington named to carry NZ flag at Rio Olympics closing ceremony
document.topic_text: This morning on NZ Herald Focus - Triple Olympic medalist Lisa Carrington will carry the flag for the New Zealan d team at the Rio Olympics closing ceremony . And, the suicide bomber who killed 51 people at a wedding in Turkey was... »
